item.title: SpaceX Rocket Analysis
item.description: This is the final capstone project where I have to utilize the data analysis tools that I learned from IBM Data Science. The things I have to do in this project are: Data collection with API and web scraping Data wrangling Exploratory data analysis using SQL EDA data visualization using Python Pandas and Matplotlib Launch sites analysis with Folium-Interactive Visual Analytics and Plotly Dash Machine learning landing prediction Data collection with API and web scraping First, I request the necessary data from the SpaceX REST API.
